entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
